module.name: physical_unit_non_planar_design_view
module.keywords: module, design, manifold surface, subsurface, physical design

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Extended elemental geometric shape, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1667;
items within the scope of application module Manifold subsurface, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1702;
items within the scope of application module Physical unit design view, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1728.

ae.refpath: manifold_subsurface_shape_representation <= shape_representation <= representation {representation [representation.id = 'acnps'] [representation.name = 'manifold subsurface'] [representation.description = 'acnps']} representation <- property_definition_representation.used_representation property_definition_representation property_definition_representation.definition -> property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition = product_definition product_definition => component_definition => assembly_component

aa.refpath: manifold_subsurface_shape_representation <= shape_representation <= representation <- property_definition_representation.used_representation property_definition_representation property_definition_representation.definition -> {property_definition => product_definition_shape} property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition = product_definition product_definition => component_definition => assembly_component
